features.name: Activities List Display
features.description: Displays a searchable, sortable table of scoring activities with reputation points
features.ui_location: Page with Activities Module > Main View
test_scenarios: View activities list with default pagination (25 items)

features.name: Activities API Service
features.description: Web API endpoint for retrieving activities with filtering, sorting, and pagination
test_scenarios: Verify only positive reputation activities returned

features.name: User Badges Display
features.description: Displays user badges in a grid layout with earned status and interactive details
features.ui_location: Page with User Badges Module > Main View
test_scenarios: View badges grid for anonymous user
View badges grid for authenticated user showing earned badges
View specific user's badges via userId parameter
Hover badge to see tooltip with 'How to Earn' info (desktop)
View 'Completed By' section with recent earners
Navigate to user profiles from badge earners list

features.name: Badge Settings Configuration
features.description: Module settings page for configuring badge display options like page size

features.name: User Badges API Service
features.description: Web API endpoints for retrieving badges and badge details with personalization
test_scenarios: POST GetBadges with valid anti-forgery token
POST GetBadges without anti-forgery token (should fail)
GET GetBadgeCard with invalid badgeId (404 error)
GET GetBadgeCard for badge in different portal (400 error)
Verify badge personalization for authenticated users
Test anonymous access to badge endpoints

features.name: Badge Detail Popup
features.description: Interactive badge detail card showing description and recent earners
test_scenarios: Display recent badge earners with avatars
Verify proper rendering of bronze/silver/gold tiers

features.name: Privileges Display
features.description: Displays available privileges with reputation requirements
features.ui_location: Page with Privileges Module > Main View

features.name: Privileges API Service
features.description: Web API endpoint for retrieving privilege information

features.name: Profile Event Tracking
features.description: Tracks and scores user profile updates including photo, bio, and completion milestones
test_scenarios: Update profile and verify ProfileUpdated event
Add profile photo and verify AddedProfilePhoto event
Remove profile photo and verify RemovedProfilePhoto event
Add biography and verify CompletedBio event
Remove biography and verify RemovedBio event
Complete 50% of profile and verify CompletedHalfProfile event
Complete 100% of profile and verify CompletedFullProfile event
Verify scoring actions are logged correctly
Test multiple profile updates in succession

features.name: Relationship Event Tracking
features.description: Tracks friend and follow relationship changes with bilateral activity logging
test_scenarios: Send friend request and verify FriendshipRequested event
Accept friend request and verify FriendAdded for both users
Remove friend and verify FriendRemoved for both users
Follow user and verify FollowedUser and FollowedByUser events
Unfollow user and verify UnfollowedUser and UnfollowedByUser events
Verify events have 0 points by default

features.name: Module Installation and Upgrade
features.description: Handles module installation and version upgrades with scoring action migrations
test_scenarios: Fresh install creates default scoring actions
Upgrade from 01.00.00 adds ViewedActivities and ViewedBadges scoring
Upgrade to 02.00.01 adds Login, Register, and ReceivedBadge scoring
Upgrade to 02.00.01 creates default 'Getting Started' badge
Upgrade to 08.00.00 disables old scoring and adds relationship scoring
Upgrade to 08.01.00 adds profile-related scoring actions
Verify badge migration to Evoq Content Library

features.name: Portal Creation Handler
features.description: Automatically adds default badges when new portals are created
features.ui_location: Admin > Site Management > Add New Site
test_scenarios: Create new portal and verify default badges added
Verify badge scoring actions updated for new portal

features.name: Default Badge Creation
features.description: Creates and manages the default 'Getting Started' badge for new users
features.ui_location: User Badges Module > Getting Started Badge
test_scenarios: Verify 'Getting Started' badge exists after installation
New user registration triggers badge earning
Badge can only be earned once per user

features.name: Activity Search and Filter
features.description: Real-time search functionality for activities with debounced input
test_scenarios: Type search term and verify 250ms debounce

features.name: Table Sorting
features.description: Client-side table sorting for activities with visual indicators
test_scenarios: Click column header to sort ascending

features.name: Badge Image Management
features.description: Handles badge image display with fallback support for missing images
test_scenarios: Handle missing badge image with fallback

features.name: Mobile Responsive Views
features.description: Responsive design for activities and badges on mobile devices
test_scenarios: Test activities table on mobile screens
Test badge grid on mobile screens
Test expandable badge details on mobile

features.name: Pagination Controls
features.description: Navigation controls for paginated results in activities and badges
features.ui_location: Activities Module > Bottom, User Badges Module > Bottom
test_scenarios: Test with single page of results
Test with many pages of results

features.name: Anti-Forgery Token Validation
features.description: CSRF protection for POST endpoints using anti-forgery tokens
test_scenarios: POST with valid anti-forgery token succeeds
POST with invalid token returns error
Multiple concurrent requests with same token

features.name: Localization Support
features.description: Multi-language support for activities and badges with resource files
